{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = USB GPRS+WLAN Dongle |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Solomon |model = SCWi375u |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NIT-SCWI375U |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = ALi;M4301A; |chip2 = GCT;GRF5101; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = GPRS |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/22/2004 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The manufacturer of this device is '''Solomon Technology Corp'''. "SCWi211b_ALi-Rev01" and "657972" appears to be silkscreened on the WiFi module board. :The WiFi module used appears to be the same as the one used with the [[Solomon SCWi311b]]. "SCMi250" appears to be silkscreened on the cellular modem board.
"361836" and "NEMO-01-REV04" appears to be silkscreened on the breakout board. The cellular modem is using a... *'''[[Motorola]]''' MC13713VH baseband processor *'''[[Motorola]]''' SC29301VF *'''[[Motorola]]''' MMM6011 *'''[[Motorola]]''' MC13712F Rev 3.1 *'''[[STMicroelectronics]]''' M58WR064 64Mbit (8 MB) *'''[[Samsung]]''' K6F8016R6B-EF70 8Mbit (1 MB) Static RAM chip [[Category:English Documentation]]
